headline: HIDEN ANALYTICAL ATMOSPHERIC/CHAMBER GAS ANALYSIS SYSTEM
categories.lvl1: Vacuum Processing Equipment > Vacuum Process Instrumentation
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Process Instrumentation > Residual Gas Analyzers
specstable:
Manufacturer Hiden Analytical
Model HPR-20 QIC
Description Atmospheric/Chamber Gas Analysis System
Mass Range 200 AMU
Accessories
  • Pfeiffer Turbo Pump
  • Pfeiffer Turbo pump Controller: Model TCP 015
  • (2) Pfeiffer Mechanical Vacuum Pumps: Model DUO 2,5A
  • Balzers IRK 250 Cold Cathode Gauge

Other Information

Mass range: 200 AMU
QIC direct inlet for Continuous sampling of 1-20 cm3 / min from 10 mbar to 2 bar.
Automated Flow Control Interface for constant ion source pressure.
Soft Ionization for the analysis of complex organics.
Stability (less than ±0.5% height variation over 24 h).

Year of Manufacture 1998
CE Marked YES
Exterior Dimensions
Width 19.500 in (49.5 cm)
Depth 25.000 in (63.5 cm)
Height 24.000 in (61.0 cm)
Weight 174 lb (79 kg)
